verses.name: Psalms 71:1
verses.text: In thee, O Lord, do I put my trust: let me never be put to confusion.

verses.name: Psalms 71:2
verses.text: Deliver me in thy righteousness, and cause me to escape: incline thine ear unto me, and save me.

verses.name: Psalms 71:3
verses.text: Be thou my strong habitation, whereunto I may continually resort: thou hast given commandment to save me; for thou art my rock and my fortress.

verses.name: Psalms 71:4
verses.text: Deliver me, O my God, out of the hand of the wicked, out of the hand of the unrighteous and cruel man.

verses.name: Psalms 71:5
verses.text: For thou art my hope, O Lord God: thou art my trust from my youth.
